column5: it's so d--- good! The grilled eggplant and rice gets me every time
column6: as does the Kobe beef. I usually order the yellowtail and tuna sashimi
column8: and definitely check out the specials. Pre-COVID
column9: this place was  a Scene. Now
column10: I order for delivery -- and the quality remains.  And I content myself with the knowledge that
column12: I'm taking the platinum card and ordering omakase.
